summary: Set in the Libyan Desert in WW2 a battalion of Czech soldiers face the siege of Tobruk.
cast: Jan Meduna|Petr Vanek|Robert Nebrenský|Michal Novotný|Martin Nahálka|Matús Krátky|Krystof Rímský|Petr Lnenicka|Andrej Polák|Petr Stach|Radim Fiala|Matej Hádek|Karel Klinovsky|Petr Halberstadt|Petr Vrsek|Elaine Cristina Weissova|Ashley White|Daniel Margolius|Václav Valtera|Jacob Erftemeijer|Tomas Michalek|Norman Birse|Julian Martin|Andreas Riegler|Ghazi Somai|Stepán Benoni|Frantisek Mesícek|Vojtech Kotek|Jaromír Meduna|Jim High|Felix Meadowsweet|Martin Fratric|Jan Monczka
title: Tobruk
